text: Lin Xue (Chinese:林雪) was a poet, painter, and calligrapher of the Ming Dynasty. == Works == * Landscape Painting, with ink on Golden Paper, on 1620. * Landscape Painting, Bamboo Tree (Hanging-Scroll style), using ink and color on Silk, on 1621, Collected at Art institute of Chicago * Landscape Painting, (Fan) using ink on Golden Paper, on 1622, Private Collection == References == Category:17th-century Chinese painters
title: Lin Xue
